programme.title: 我的未来有未来 How To Train Your Future - EP 7
programme.desc: Xiao Shu follows Zhi Shu to year 2035. He realizes that Zhi Shu is indeed a failure in life. Zhi Shu gets fired by his boss, abandoned by his girlfriend Si Si and he even loses his two best friends, Xiao Tong and Chao Wei. To make matter worse, two loan sharks arrive at Zhi Shu's house to demand payment. Xiao Shu and Zhi Shu immediately run away. While escaping, they make the same wish to return to year 2020 and both of them disappear into the air... 小树随直树来到2035年，发现2035年的直树确实很失败。 他不但被老板开除，被女友思思抛弃，还失去小童和朝伟这两位好友。直树和小树正感灰心时，大耳窿前来追债。两人立刻逃跑，同时许愿回到2020年，跟着瞬间消失在空气中….

programme.title: 阿莫的日记 Diary Of Amos Lee - EP 8
programme.desc: Amos wants a birthday party of his own. His mum sets a $300 budget and will deduct accordingly to his performance. He also wants to select his own guestlist and comes up with a similar point-based system. Those who doesn't perform up to standard, will be deducted points. Amos希望有属于自己的生日。妈妈表示要看表现，以$300预算为铒，只要Amos犯错，就减扣。Amos无奈，只能步步为营。此外，Amos也决定精挑自己的宾客名单，于是想出如妈妈一般的扣分制，只要不符自己期望的，就逐一扣分，结果…….

(PG-些许性相关语)(重)宝华发现旭廷和树人有过一段见不得光的过去，怂恿旭廷将当年之事公开，让树人名誉受损，借此替君豪上诉。海伦的尸体被发现，安生成为最大嫌疑犯。美琪追查海伦深夜到游艇码头的原因，过程中结识导游阿杜，家明怀疑阿杜与海伦之死有关….

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 3

(重)婚宴上，新郎光忠无故昏倒，气息全无。国恩大力地捶光忠的胸部，把他救醒。光忠被诊断患上心脏血管阻塞，需要观察，不料情况突变，光忠突然逝世，韵文大受刺激晕倒，醒来后不吃不喝，屡劝不果。敏妃忍不住打了她一个耳光，让她觉醒。.

Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.desc: (R) Jun Wei asks Jia Qi for information on the hostel she stayed in while in England as he has a friend who intends to pursue further studies there. This triggers Jia Qi's recollection of some unhappy memories and Jun Wei asks if anything happened in England. Jia Qi feels pressured and finds an excuse to leave, leaving Jun Wei baffled. It turns out that Jia Qi's friend committed suicide in the hostel; but she didn't manage to stop her friend in time, and this makes her feel great remorse. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)骏威透露有朋友会去英国深造，向嘉琪询问她所住过的宿舍的详情。嘉琪被勾起伤心事，骏威见状，问她在英国是否发生什么不愉快的事。嘉琪倍感压力，找借口离去，骏威若有所思。原来嘉琪的朋友若善在宿舍自杀身亡，嘉琪阻止不及，悔恨不堪。.

Upon learning that Steven & Lai Fong's 17th wedding anniversary is nearing, Felicia brings the children out for floral arrangement and baking lessons to surprise their parents on their special day. 双薪夫妻张志文和符莱凤育有5个孩子。来自小家庭的陈凤玲，探访了他们一家7口，深入了解他们的生活，也亲自感受大家庭所带来的喜悦与满足感。陈凤玲也首次体验当保姆，带着小朋友们出游、上插花课和烘焙课。在陈凤玲的安排下，5个孩子分工合作，为父母精心策划他们结婚17周年的惊喜派对。.

programme.desc: (R) Ke Ai's fans come in droves to 118. One of them snuck a picture of Ke Ai. Infuriated, Shun Shui insists that the phone be checked. The fan refuses and things get heated. (PG)(重)可爱的粉丝到118来支持她，其中一人还偷拍她的照片，被顺风发现，要对方交出手机检查，对方拒绝，顺水不肯罢休，双方闹得很不愉快。对方指顺水没资格要他删除照片，顺水说自己是可爱的未婚夫，但可爱却否认，让顺水下不了台。.

Why is the malay traditional drum Rebana Ubi shaped like a flower? In this week's "Small Town Surprises", Sugie brings our Chng family to Kota Bahru in search of these answers. Watch on to find out! (重)兰花饭为什么是蓝色的呢？马来传统皮影戏里的好人和坏人角色有什么区别？马来传统热巴那鼓又为什么长的像一朵花呢？跟着我们的城管 Sugie 还有庄家一同踏上我们的《小城花样多》吉兰丹之旅，寻找答案！.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 6
programme.desc: Oscar sends Xiaoxiao to the national hairdressing competition. Wen Ya chases Xiaoxiao away. Xiaoxiao looks up to hairdressing wizard Ah Man (Starhair salons boss) as her idol. Ah Man intentionally keeps his identity from her and tells her that she can find Ah Man at the beach early in the morning. Oscar派小小参加全国发型大赛，文雅妒恨不已，当场将小小赶走。小小因此认识自己的偶像——发廊界的奇才阿满。阿满是“Star”发廊的老板，他知道小小仰慕自己，刻意隐瞒身份，告诉她可以在清晨的海边找到阿满。小小雀跃不已。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Yunwen contemplates suicide, Guo En managed to save her. Minfei wants Yunwen to go for counselling but doesn't trust Chinese treatment after what her own late mother went through. (重)韵文失踪，大家发现她在大厦楼顶想自杀，国恩把她救下来。敏妃要求平静下来的韵文接受心理辅导，却再次想起当年母亲接受父亲的中医治疗，最后不治身亡的痛苦回忆，敏妃从此对中医不再信任。.

He goes to stop them and beats Harry up when he sees him. Harry is injured, and Qing Hao realizes that he misunderstood them. The fact is Hui Yan intended to reject Harry's suggestion and tell him that it will be more meaningful if she starts her business on her own. Harry respects her decision. (PG)(重)庆豪听说慧妍和Harry在酒店见面，以为两人要进行不道德交易，赶去阻止，还不由分说对Harry挥拳，把他打伤，过后才知自己摆乌龙。原来慧妍是要告诉Harry，自己决定拒绝他的提议。她想要凭着自己的能力创业，这样才有意义。Harry尊重她的决定。.

Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 新马美食一家亲 Makan Unlimited - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Food travelogue that explores the similarities and differences between the common foods in Singapore and Malaysia. (重)海南鸡饭、肉骨茶、叻沙等等都是大家熟悉不过的南洋美食，尤以新加坡和马来西亚最为普及，也深受新马人民的喜爱，早已成为两地人民生活的一部分。主持人王禄江将走访两地带观众们看看同一道美食之间的不同。.

programme.title: BENGpire 黑黑 真好玩 BENGpire - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the Bengpires ride on the Hallyu Wave, trying out the hottest Night Assault Laser Tag Game in town, dressing up as characters from the hottest K-Drama Descendants of The Sun. The night will be incomplete without filling up on delicious Korean food, savoury 9-layered steamed seafood platter and sweet Bingsu. (重).

programme.title: 城市觅食 City Foragers - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Given our love for spices in Southeast Asia, we may think we know all there is about them. Think again. Have you seen fresh spices before they're dried and shrivelled? Could they be found in Singapore? Aside from cooking, what roles did spices play in traditional healthcare and healing? And how were spices used to nurse the body? (重)我们都以为对香料非常了解。殊不知只见过晒干后的香料，却不曾目睹香料的原貌。这一集，除了让你见识香料的真面目，还让带你走入香菜的香浓世界。除了能增添香味，香料在传统民俗疗法中扮演重要的角色。到底如何用香料来调养身体呢？.

In return, Jian Yi removes Frank's clothes, ties him on the long bench, and stream him on live feed. Zi Xin wakes up speechless and vaguely remembers that Jian Yi saves her. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)建一来到爵士酒吧，得知子欣和Frank外出，他心知不妙，赶到Frank家，救了差点被奸污的子欣，还将Frank狠狠教训一顿，将他脱去衣服，五花大绑在长凳上，在网上做直播。子欣醒来，隐约想起建一救她的事，心里五味杂陈。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 7

programme.desc: (R) Jia Qi tells Xiu Yu that Jun Wei is not her boyfriend when Xiu Yu keeps bombarding her with questions, she told this lie to make Cheng Guang give up on her. Jia Qi recalls all that had happened between them and realizes there were many coincidences, she starts to suspect Jun Wei. They speculate that suspect could possibly board the same bus as the victims often to notice them. Base on this clue, Jian Yi starts planning. programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 81
programme.desc: Tian Cheng presents irrefutable evidence that Da Gong and Da Li are in cahoots. Jie Jie is dumbfounded. Tian Cheng gleefully claims that she should have listened to him from the start and that he knew that they were conmen. 天成把大功和大利是同伙的证据出示给洁洁看，洁洁见证据确凿，无言以对。天成得意洋洋，说一早就看透大功是个骗子，不断提醒洁洁，但洁洁却当耳边风，乘机调侃洁洁一番。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 7
programme.desc: The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 8
programme.desc: Wen Ya does not feel justified losing Oscar. She approaches Fei Long to make Xiaoxiao take drugs and do things that Oscar would never be able to accept. Oscar is stunned to see Xiaoxiao and Feilong taking drugs and being intimate in an unclear state of mind 文雅不甘失去Oscar，要飞龙跟她合作，陷害小小嗑药，做出令Oscar不能接受的事。Oscar因为小小有些不舒服，放心不下，买了夜宵回来发廊看她，却惊见小小和飞龙嗑了药，神智不清地又搂又抱……。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 6
programme.desc: Zhiyi happily informed Guo En during their dinner that she has been assigned another medical legal case but she is not confident of winning it. Guo En encourages her. Zhiyi's feelings for Guo En is re-kindled but she trys to suppress it. Zhiyi is representing Minfei, Guofei tried to get information about Minfei as he is concerned about her. Zhiyi refused to divulge. 芝仪与国恩用餐，开心报告自己接下一宗医疗诉讼案，但信心不足，国恩鼓励她。芝仪对国恩旧情复燃，但努力压抑自己的情感。原来芝仪正是敏妃的代表律师，国恩关心敏妃，追问案件胜诉的机会，芝仪表示无可奉告。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 336
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 24
programme.desc: Wei Kang tries to persuade Xiu Yu and Qing Hao into investing in virtual currency but they are not convinced. Xiu Yu says that she heard of many scams surrounding virtual currency investments and advises Wei Kang to withdraw from it but it falls on deaf ears. Wei Kang's investment eventually turns out to be a scam and he is at his wits end, being chased by creditors. Meanwhile, Chris intends to run away with the funds... 维康极力游说秀玉和庆豪投资虚拟货币，两人不为所动。秀玉听说虚拟货币投资很多都是骗局，劝维康抽身，维康完全听不入耳。维康的投资果然被揭发是个骗局，他被投资者追债，走投无路，而Chris则想卷款而逃……。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 108
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 34
programme.desc: (34A) To ensure that Bei Er's wedding goes smoothly, Xiuhui tells Liying to keep Weijia away from Bei Er. Since Weijia wants to leave Hong Kong, Chengfeng urges Yongzheng and Liying to allow Weijia to take a breather and stay at his friend's place in Portugal.(34B) Before Weijia leaves Hong Kong, he signs an agreement to allow Chengfeng to handle his shares. Chengfeng attends the Chamber of Commerce dinner as the Assistant CEO of Jia Chang Wang Group. He views Zhaoxiong, who's sitting at the m (34A)秀慧为婚礼能顺利举行，约丽荧出来会面，希望她让围家别缠着贝儿。围家想离开香港这个伤心地，乘风劝永正及丽荧让围家出外散心，更可寄住细辉于葡萄牙的家。 (34B)围家离港前签署了授权书，将自己的股份授权乘风处理。乘风以家昌旺副行政总裁身份出席商会晚宴，看着坐在最高荣誉金席的兆雄，视为奋斗目标。.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses the terms Suku (quarter-insane), Jamban (toilet), different words used to describe time, and traces how Yew Tee got its name. 《新语研究所 2 》和大家轻松谈论为什么须古除了指四分一，也用来指神经质、头脑不清？Jamban的词源是什么？为什么五分钟、星期也说成一个字、礼拜？油池的名称的由来？.

programme.title: 伺机 The Driver - EP 10
programme.desc: Adele arrives at Xu Zhen's house to investigate his death. She's shocked to find a blue-white rose. Adele visits Biao and discusses Xu Zhen's case with him. She suspects the Japanese killer has come to Singapore and is after the Vigilante. Adele also thinks the Vigilante has more than 1 accomplice. Adele来到徐振家，探查徐振的案件。她发现凶手留下的蓝白玫瑰花，大惊。Adele探望标叔，讨论徐振的案件。他们怀疑凶手为了“追踪者”来到新加坡。Adele也表示调查“追踪者”的事情有了发展，Adele怀疑追踪者不止有Panda骇客的帮助而且还有一名身手敏捷的女子相助。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻包括国会摘要 News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament - EP 5
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 38
programme.desc: Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 42
programme.desc: Jin Guangyao revealed the identity of Wu Xian in public. Jin Ling has always believed that he lost his parents because of Wei Wu Xian, so he stabbed Wuxian. 金光瑶当众揭穿无羡身份，一直认为是魏无羡让自己失去了父母的金凌，便狠心将剑刺入魏无羡腹部。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 42
programme.desc: Jin Guangyao revealed the identity of Wu Xian in public. Jin Ling has always believed that he lost his parents because of Wei Wu Xian, so he stabbed Wuxian. 金光瑶当众揭穿无羡身份，一直认为是魏无羡让自己失去了父母的金凌，便狠心将剑刺入魏无羡腹部。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 15
programme.desc: Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 邻里合作社 United Neighbours Society - EP 6
programme.desc: United Neighbours Society is a community-involvement program that features 2 teams of 10 participants every week, coming together to pit against each other in their creativity & artistic skills in decorating a massive structure iconic to a particular neighbourhood!

金牌师爷 The Witty Advisor - EP 26

programme.title: 名厨出走记 2 之重新出发 Love On The Plate S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: The 2nd season of this award-winning food reality programme returns! Using limited ingredients that are available in the rural villages, celebrity chefs will harvest-catch the ingredients and whip up a mouth watering feast for the villagers. (重)新系列延续了第一系列的精神，安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。.

programme.title: 我赚到了！ Thrift Hunters - EP 2
programme.desc: Lunar New Year is around the corner, our hosts are having a great shopping experience at a Japanese supermarket. Besides that, enjoy a 1 for 1 hot pot buffet at a Japanese Restaurant. Ordering special cheesecake online, is absolutely value for money, along with various types of hand-made cookies and pastries, suitable to celebrate with friends and family during festive season. 农历新年即将来临，到日本超市办年货，可购买价廉物美的食品，还有买一送一的日式火锅自助餐也不容错过，而网购的特价芝士蛋糕，绝对是物有所值，再加上手工制作的新年糕点，不但多样化，价格也实惠，可买来与亲友共度欢乐佳节！.

programme.title: 凤还巢 Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng Pu is getting old and his daughters are still not married. Elder daughter Shueh-yeh is so ugly no one wants her. Younger daughter Shueh-wu is beautiful but not allowed to marry before her elder sister. The drama unfolds when Cheng decides to marry Shueh-wu off. 上元佳节，潮州城内第一美人黄碧据-五娘偕婢益春赏灯，遭恶少林大雄调戏。五娘逃进吕员外家，邂逅泉州才子陈伯卿-兵部侍郎程浦(井淼飾)將次女雪娥(李香君 飾)許配予好友之子穆居易(金峰 飾)，庶室程夫人(高寶樹 飾)既憤且惱，對居易訛稱長女雪雁(莊元庸 飾)乃雪娥，催促二人早日成親。居易見雪雁貌醜而癡，嚇得留書出走。.

programme.title: 欢喜没烦恼 Happy-Go-Lucky - EP 6
programme.desc: It seems that everyone at Happy Street knows exactly how to do financial planning. Watch how each of them plans for their retirement and learn from them! Catch also the two "Ling Lings" as they explore some of the best promotional food prices for seniors in Singapore. 欢喜街的街坊似乎都对财务规划了如指掌。看看大家如何为未来的退休生活规划，跟他们学两招吧！两位“玲玲"也难得合体，一起去找适合乐龄人士的优惠价好lobang！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 8
programme.desc: Eating healthy goes a long way, watch on to find out how to incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 想补充养分、膳食纤维同时维持身段？不妨喝蔬果饮料当代餐吧！.

programme.title: 一点新闻 News 8 At One - EP 240
programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines. 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 82
programme.desc: Zhen Hui accompanies the injured Yu Ye home and buys ointment for her. Yu Yue however, is indifferent to his actions. Shun Shui rages and chases Zhen Hui out. Yi Yi on the other hand, is also injured, requiring Ya Zhou's help. Both bicker continuously, much to Ji Zhou's chagrin. 振辉送小腿受伤的玉叶回来，还特地买了条药膏给她搽脚，玉叶却不领情。顺水忽然大发雷霆，赶振辉离开，大家都被顺水的过度反应吓到。依依也没比玉叶好多少，她伤了腰，还得由亚洲背回家。两人互相指责对方，际洲看得直摇头。.

programme.title: 新成龙历险记2 All New Jackie Chan Adventures S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Professor Chaos is a villain who creates capsule monsters out of children's bad habits and uses them to turn dreams into nightmares. The brave, smart and kind guardians of J-Team, Jackie, Amy and Duangduang, must stand up against Professor Chaos and his evil plan by stopping all his evil creations and protect children from the nightmares! 乱来教授是一名恶棍，他根据孩子的坏习惯制造胶囊怪物，用它们将梦想变成噩梦。 J-Team的杰克 ,小美和铛铛是勇敢，聪明和善良的梦境守护者。他们阻止乱来教授的邪恶创作并保护孩子免受噩梦，对抗乱来教授和他的邪恶计划！.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 9
programme.desc: Grandma rents a neighbourhood salon for Xiaoxiao to run. Xiaoxiao is stunned but happy. Fei Long and his runners help Xiaoxiao to distribute flyers and promote the salon, but business is bleak. Xiaoxiao decides to price her services at a low cost to attract customers. 外婆顶下一间邻里美发店让小小做生意，小小又惊又喜。飞龙和手下热心地帮忙发传单、招徕顾客，但生意惨淡。小小决定以低收费吸引顾客，果然吸引了一些好奇的顾客，飞龙等人半骗半哄上门的顾客额外消费……。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 22
programme.desc: A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. 这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 25
programme.desc: Wei Kang beats Chris up and decides to take his own life but is stopped by Xiu Yu and the rest. Wei Kang turns himself in and is detained; he feels guilty for causing many investors to lose all their money and is plagued by bad dreams. Xiu Yu decides to sell her house to compensate the victims; she informs Qing Hao and the rest that they soon have to move out of the house, they are saddened by this news... 维康打伤Chris后, 决定轻生，幸被秀玉等阻止。维康自首被拘留，他因连累众多投资者血本无归而心里不安，连连做恶梦。秀玉毅然决定把洋房卖掉，补偿那些受害者。她通知庆豪等人搬走，众人依依不舍……。.

programme.title: Body SOS Sr 8 - EP 31
programme.desc: About 85% of the local population suffer from mild to moderately severe periodontal disease! What are symptoms and risk factors? Is diabetes linked to gum disease? In TCM theory, what are the connections between gum problems and organs? How to treat and prevent? 据估计，本地有大约85% 人患牙周病！牙周病有哪些症状和风险因素？糖尿病和牙周病息息相关？！从中医角度解读，牙周病和哪些脏腑功能失调有关？中西医如何治疗和预防？.

programme.title: 城市觅食 City Foragers - EP 3
programme.desc: Apart from tapioca and sweet potatoes, the residents of Singapore mostly relied on cultivated or foraged vegetables for subsistence during the Japanese Occupation. Just what is so different about wild vegetables? How do they go from meadow to ladle? And how did wartime resourcefulness turn a certain well-loved refreshment into a versatile food for hungry mouths during those years of deprivation? 除了木薯番薯等块根食物，本地人日治时期吃的多是种植和野外采摘的蔬菜。当时所谓野菜，有什么特别？今天大家热爱的一样消暑圣品，当年因人们发挥巧思而变身万用食材，弥补了口味的不足。菜上哪儿找？怎么吃才好？.

However, they soon bump into Hulk and Officer Xinyi. A friendly get together soon turns into couple challenge with Hulk and his new girl against Pepper and the reluctant, Jian Dong. Pegasus Vs Bravo的第三场比赛，就是paintball，模拟战争游戏。在比赛里，众女兵再次表现出顽强的意志，打赢了Bravo的那些男兵，在比赛中2比1领先了。只要下一场CQC （近身搏击）可以赢，那Pegasus Platoon就会赢整个团队的比赛了。Book Out后，众人去喝酒庆祝，也请了建东。在Pub里，那里正好举行最佳情侣的比赛，并看到Hulk和何欣怡也参加了比赛。玉坤故意为Pepper报名，让Pepper和建东一去参加。Pepper后来被Hulk刺激，也欣然答应参加比赛。没想到在比赛时，她意外的发现建东或许真的爱上自己了。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 8

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 6

Once he found someone, he will contact their families with the help of his fans. He has since helped some 90 homeless people returning homes. 中国网络主播牛哥追梦，以户外直播的方式，帮助流浪汉回家。他直播的内容，主要是在桥底下、马路边和垃圾堆旁寻找流浪汉，劝说他们寻求协助；他还通过各种方式联系他们的家人。迄今牛哥已经帮助约九十名流浪汉回返家园。.

Enzu receives a call from her mother saying her stepfather, Hong Runqi, is threatening to commit suicide on the rooftop of the Dahe Group building. Enzu and Dehao rush over to stop him. 德浩自在前妻海卿家看到他以前的全家福旧相片后，不禁回忆以前与海卿相识、相爱、结婚及分手的的经过，感慨万分。恩祖突然接到妈妈的电话说继父洪润奇在大和集团的楼顶要闹自杀，连忙与德浩前去劝阻。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 14

Chairman Zheng is furious that he has to deal with Dehao again. He summons Dehao's ex-father-in-law, Xinyou, and blames him for not getting rid of Dehao earlier, thus creating the trouble now. 德浩要当洪润奇的代表律师，替他向郑会长追回大和集团耍赖所欠的二十亿外包工程款项。郑会长得知自己又要和德浩交手，感到非常气愤。郑会长找来了德浩的前岳父信佑，责备信佑之前没除掉德浩，现留下祸根。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 4
programme.desc: Even with a Master's degree, Taiwanese graduates struggle with low starting pay with some forced to look for brighter prospects in a night market stall. For a working single mother to own a piece of property, taking on 3 jobs makes barely enough to pay for hefty housing loan. And even into his seventies, an elderly part time worker struggles with high tuition and pricey private school fees to enable his teenage daughter to compete effectively. 硕士毕业生面对学历贬值、薪水低的‘闷世代'，选择在夜市摆摊。单亲妈妈身兼三职， 只为供房、供女儿念大学。72岁的资深编辑老来被迫接受低薪来养家。一起进入台北打工仔的生活， 了解他们辛勤工作的动力。.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 5
programme.desc: Nose to tail eating, where no part of an animal goes to waste, is a current global fad. But for centuries, Filipinos have been creatively cooking bits and ends like feet, innards and blood. This week, things get heady with the pricey Cabeza de Jabali cold cuts of meat made with a boar's head. 将动物的每一个部位烹调上桌的做法是时下许多厨师热衷的美食趋势。可是菲律宾人早在数百年前就开始用创意的烹饪手法将动物的脚、内脏甚至血液精彩上桌。这一期的佳肴是昂贵的水晶肴肉，使用了猪肉以及猪头部分的肉。.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 5
programme.desc: Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. 洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 17
programme.desc: Ep 17: Wu Chun shields Juxi from a crashing floral stand and gets injured herself instead. Wu Chun assumes that Juxi is a worker at the restaurant and tries her best to prevent Juxi from getting sacked. Juxi is touched by Wu Chun's sincere and down-to-earth personality. Ep 17: 菊熙到卖场巡视，不小心绊倒花圈，险些被花圈砸到。吴春挡着菊熙，自己却受伤。吴春不知道菊熙的真实身份，以为她也是卖场的员工，担心菊熙保不住饭碗，态度诚恳又谦卑，令菊熙很感动。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 18
programme.desc: Ep 18: A blogger orders a special meal, but she is only interested in taking photos of the food and attempts to leave without eating or paying, therefore wasting the chefs' efforts. Wu Chun tells the blogger off. The displeased blogger orders Wu Chun to go down on her knees and apologise to her. Ep 18: 一名部落客在丰吉堂预定特别料理，到场后只拍照，不吃，浪费厨师们的一番苦心，过后甚至还不肯付钱。吴春坦白地数落部落客的不是，结果被部落客斥责，要吴春下跪道歉。吴春为了泰浩和丰吉堂着想，硬着头皮下跪。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 15
programme.desc: Ep 15The Building Director of the Dahe Group, Li Mingjun, calls Dehao unexpectedly. He claims that he has something about Hong Runqi's case to tell Dehao and asks Dehao to meet him at the construction site. Dehao gets assaulted when he reaches the site. It turns out that Chairman Zheng masterminded the attack to get rid of Dehao. Ep 15大家一直在寻找的大和集团建设理事李明俊突然打给德浩，他说要告诉德浩有关洪润奇案件的事，约德浩到施工现场见面。不料德浩到达目的地时，突然被人袭击。原来这一切都是郑会长的阴谋，暗中派人干掉德浩。Ep 16失踪的李明俊终于被德浩找出。郑会长得知消息后十分生气，因他知道若德浩获知李明俊握有他的秘密资金账簿，就会利用它来对付他。德浩试着游说李明俊做洪润奇的案件证人，指控郑会长......

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 4
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 12
programme.desc: Ep 15While walking alone on the street, a car suddenly speeds towards Yanjing. Xu Ren tries to save Yanjing and both get hit by the car. They are in ancient Korea again when they wake up...Ep 16General Shaye Ke locks Yanjing and kids to force Xu Ren to treat his comrade. He promises to release Yanjing and kids if Xu Ren cures his comrade. Ep 15妍京独自一人走在大街上，一辆汽车突然疾驶过来。许任为了救妍京，两人同时被车撞飞。当他们醒来后，两人已经在朝鲜了......Ep 16沙也可将军将妍京和孩子们关了起来，威胁许任救治他的同伴。沙也可将军承诺只要许任能够治好同伴，他就放了妍京和孩子们。.

programme.title: 守护者 The Guardians - EP 9
programme.desc: A Vietnamese saying goes: complete leaves have a responsibility to protect the broken leaves. A group of low-income people in Ho Chi Minh City lead simple lives so as to provide warmth to poorer families. They also salvage unidentified corpses in the Sai Kung River, giving them a final touch of dignity. 越南俗语说，完整的树叶有责任保护破碎的树叶。胡志明市有着一群经济拮据的人，不惜过着最简朴的生活，也要为更穷苦的家庭提供一点温暖。除了悲悯生者，更不忌讳禁忌，从西贡河上打捞不知名的浮尸，为其举行葬礼，只盼能给往生者最后一丝尊严。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 2 Mars Vs Venus 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: The upbringing of a child is known to be shared between both parents. However the unconventional methods that men use have often been criticized by women. We have Charlyn Lin and her husband to share their first hand experiences on this topic. Do catch this episode to find out more! 孩子是夫妻爱情的结晶，可是女人就是看不过男人管教孩子的方法。到底是父亲还是母亲对孩子的未来比较积极？究竟现在的孩子要如何教？林翠芳和老公对孩子的管教大不同！究竟是爸爸赢还是妈妈胜？且看节目知分晓！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 50
programme.desc: Ep 67: Huizhu hurts her wrist when she works at Shanyu's shop. Hengkui scolds Shanyu when he is certain that Shanyu is out to make things difficult for Huizhu and even looks down on Shanyu's shop. Hengshun fights with Hengkui over his comments.Ep 68: Dongchu leaves home after a quarrel with Shanyu. Xuncai tells Dongchu about Shanyu's illness as he does not want Dongchu to miss out on spending precious time with Shanyu. Ep 67: 惠珠到小菜店帮忙时弄伤手腕。亨奎觉得珊玉故意刁难惠珠，于是不满地责备珊玉，还嫌弃小菜店。亨顺觉得亨奎过分，跟亨奎打起架来。Ep 68: 东出不明白为何珊玉性情大变，与珊玉大吵一架后离家。勋才不希望东出错失跟珊玉相处的时间，将珊玉的病情告诉东出。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 7
programme.desc: YB Corporation is holding a Boss Award. The winner will get a boost in promotion, reputation and popularity. Yunli hopes Zhiyuan will participate but Zhiyuan is not interested. Yunli's flattery, threats and pathetic cries do not work on Zhiyuan. YB公司将举办上司选拔, 胜利者可以快速地提升职位、名誉与人气。允利希望致原参加，但致原却对这些不感兴趣。允利怎么阿谀奉承、威胁、哭诉都对致原行不通。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 59
programme.desc: Ep 47:Lanxue voices her objections when Junxiang announces that he is marrying Xuehua. Junxiang's grandma also disagrees to Junxiang marrying Xuehua when she learns that Xuehua is an illegitimate child. Ep 47: 当俊相宣布要与雪花结婚，却遭兰雪大力反对。俊相奶奶得知雪花是私生子女后, 也不赞成他们的婚事。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 61
programme.desc: Ep 48: Minxi discovers that Lanxue and Zhengdao grew up at the same orphanage. Junxiang realizes that Lanxue is Xuehua's biological mother when he sees her crying over Xuehua. Ep 48: 敏熙查到兰雪与政道是在同间孤儿院长大的。俊相听到兰雪独自在房间哭着叫雪花的名字，意识到雪花是她的女儿。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 10
programme.desc: After much hesitation and peer pressure from Lian Hua, Jian Dong finally decides to ask Pepper out on a date which leads to some shocking revelation into his dark past. At the same time, the final challenge between Pegasus and Bravo company is going to be a CQC challenge. Pepper will be leading a team of girls up against the rival platoon of guys. What will the outcome be? 次日，是Pegasus Vs Bravo的最后一场比赛，CQC，也就是近身搏击。Pepper带领女兵，最后真的打败了那些男兵，大家开心的跳了起来。另一方面，建东鼓起勇气约Pepper出来约会，趁机表白，也告诉Pepper自己的另一面。 他希望Pepper知道自己所有的过去。Pepper听了虽然感触，却也不置可否，毕竟心里还是有着Hulk。这时敲门声，Pepper开门，没想到站在门口的竟然是Hulk。.

programme.title: As Long As You Live S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 16: Li He is enraged when he discovers that Youla has known Luo Wangzhi for years. Li He feels cheated by Youla. He captures her and locks her up in a burning car. 李赫发现宥拉其实认识罗王植而且还亲似夫妻。李赫觉得被宥拉欺骗，把她捉起来，关进一辆车里，然后放火烧车。.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 3
programme.desc: Down syndrome is the most common and readily identifiable chromosomal condition associated with intellectual disabilities. It is caused by a chromosomal abnormality: for some unknown reason, an accident in cell development results in 47 instead of the usual 46 chromosomes. This extra chromosome changes the orderly development of the body and brain. In most cases, the diagnosis of Down syndrome is made according to results from a chromosome test administered in the 16th week of pregnancyJust as in the normal population, there is a wide variation in mental abilities, behavior, and developmental progress in individuals with Down syndrome. Besides having a distinct physical appearance, children with Down syndrome frequently have specific health-related problems This episode highlights challenges a family faces with a Down's syndrome child. Interview will retrace from the point the condition is discovered (during pregnancy) and challenges the parents face along the way. We will also fi.

programme.title: Helo Switzerland - EP 3
programme.desc: This Travelogue features host Ben Ali's exploration to several important destinations in Switzerland including the popular big cities, small towns and interesting locations in the outskirts. More interestingly, many adventure tips for budget travelers will be revealed to guide the audience.Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders - but the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. This feature gives us access to some of Singapore's most unique islands.

programme.title: Siap@ Sedia: Transformasi
programme.desc: They are visible but hardly noticeable. They are essential in ensuring the safety and security of premises all over the island. However, the presence of security officers, are often seen as unnecessary or even a nuisance in Singapore where the crime rate is notably low. Jaga-Jaga documents the lives of security officers, inspects how their job goes beyond managing visitors to a premise and charts the evolution of their jobs and the security industry as a whole.

Meanwhile, Kim Chian, the owner of Bunga Tanjong, tells Wan Katijah that he needs a lady dancer at the club. Wan Katijah introduces Mariam to him.
